children.text: As a full stack web developer, I am passionate about creating interactive and responsive web applications. My experience includes working with JavaScript, React, Next.js, and NestJS. On the backend, I have worked with Express, PostgreSQL, Sequelize, and Prisma. I am proficient in HTML, CSS, and Git.

In addition to my development skills, I have hands-on experience with DevOps, including setting up CI/CD pipelines using GitHub and Azure DevOps. I am also familiar with deployment platforms like Vercel and Render, as well as various AWS services such as S3, EC2, and CloudFront. I am a quick learner, always eager to expand my knowledge and skill set. I thrive in team environments and am excited to collaborate with others to create outstanding applications.

education.institution: Ho Chi Minh University of Science, Ho Chi Minh

experience.description: Working on AI Food Detector and other AI integrations.
Worked on enterprise applications using .NET and Azure.
